CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Four bridging dithiophene units with the atoms of carbon ( C ) , silicon ( Si ) , germanium ( Ge ) and nitrogen ( N ) afford cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene ( CPDT ) , dithienosilole ( DTS ) , dithienogermole ( DTG ) and dithieno [ 3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole ( DTP ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
------------

* carbon
* silicon
* germanium
* nitrogen
* cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT)
* dithienosilole (DTS)
* dithienogermole (DTG)
* dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
------------

* cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT)
* dithienosilole (DTS)
* dithienogermole (DTG)
* dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Four bridging dithiophene units with the atoms of carbon ( C ) , silicon ( Si ) , germanium ( Ge ) and nitrogen ( N ) afford cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene ( CPDT ) , dithienosilole ( DTS ) , dithienogermole ( DTG ) and dithieno [ 3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole ( DTP ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Four bridging dithiophene units |
| atoms of carbon (C) |
| silicon (Si) |
| germanium (Ge) |
| nitrogen (N) |
| cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT) |
| dithienosilole (DTS) |
| dithienogermole (DTG) |
| dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Four bridging dithiophene units |
| cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT) |
| dithienosilole (DTS) |
| dithienogermole (DTG) |
| dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |

Explanation:

* "atoms of carbon (C)", "silicon (Si)", "germanium (Ge)", and "nitrogen (N)" are not materials, but elements that make up the materials.
* "Four bridging dithiophene units" is a general term for the class of materials being discussed, and not a specific material property.
